backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Momentum app defining all data types (User, Task, List, MorningRoutine, SpendRecord, etc.) and canister state, with access control and user management logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the Skipped Day Reset frontend fix (cache invalidation for routines/streak data) to its implementation files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summaries of all frontend source files describing component responsibilities, prop interfaces, and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/docs/task-toggle-audit.md: Audit document identifying latency sources in task completion toggles (no optimistic updates, full query invalidation, heavy backend validation) and recommending the optimistic mutation pattern used by routines.
frontend/docs/test-date-removal-plan.md: Step-by-step plan for removing the temporary test date override feature that was used to debug routine daily rollover and streak logic.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file defining Tailwind base imports and OKLCH CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Momentum PWA with viewport, theme-color, iOS/Android PWA meta tags, manifest link, and root div.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for Momentum defining name, display mode, theme colors, orientation, and icon assets.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing network-first caching strategy with install/activate cache management and offline fallback to index.html.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages top-level view state, switching between TaskManager and AdminDashboard, and renders the ThemeProvider, Toaster, and OfflineIndicator.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserD: An admin panel component that lists all users in a searchable, paginated table, allowing admins to promote/demote users and change their subscription tier.
frontend/src/components/admin/StorageMon: An admin dashboard component that displays overall canister storage metrics and a paginated per-user storage breakdown table with copy-to-clipboard support for principal IDs.
frontend/src/components/admin/TierSettin: An admin settings component for configuring per-tier limits (max tasks, lists, routines) for each user tier, with support for toggling unlimited values and saving changes to the backend.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapLoa: Simple full-screen loading spinner component displayed during authentication initialization.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Bottom navigation bar component with a central FAB supporting long-press to switch plan mode, swipe gestures, animated menu expansion, and action buttons for tasks, lists, settings, earnings, and user info.
frontend/src/components/CreateListDialog: A modal dialog component for creating a new task list, with a controlled text input for the list name and submit/cancel buttons.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/CustomLists.tsx: A memoized component that renders user-created task lists with drag-and-drop reordering, task cards, and controls to add or delete tasks and lists.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: A modal dialog for editing an existing task's title, description, list assignment, urgency, importance, and completion status, with delete support.
frontend/src/components/EisenhowerMatrix: A memoized component rendering a collapsible Eisenhower priority matrix with four quadrants, supporting drag-and-drop task placement and a plan mode toggle.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A simple footer component displaying a copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: The app header with Internet Identity authentication, user profile display, admin access, theme toggle, test date picker, and new-day reset controls.
frontend/src/components/InsightsDialog.t: A dialog showing spending and balance insights with tabbed views and a bar chart filtered by daily, weekly, or all-time periods using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/MonetarySettings: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/MorningRoutine.t: Renders a collapsible Morning or Evening Routine section with drag-and-drop reordering, checkbox completion, add/delete dialogs, and a two-column display toggle.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Displays a full-screen overlay when the browser loses internet connectivity, listening to the window online/offline events.
frontend/src/components/PayrollHistoryDi: Dialog that lists payroll records sorted by date, allowing inline editing of totals and submission of pending payroll entries.
frontend/src/components/PlanModeTipDialo: Informational dialog that explains Plan Mode features such as dragging tasks between lists and reordering within a list.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Settings dialog for configuring the monetary earnings system, including sliders for daily money caps split across morning routine, daily priorities, and evening routine sections.
Dialog for logging spending entries via quick-add presets or custom amounts, with preset management (create/edit/delete) and a confirmation step before saving.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: A memoized task card component supporting drag-and-drop (mouse and touch), edit/delete/complete actions, and a long-press-to-edit mode for mobile, with edit state lifted to the parent via `editTaskId`/`setEditTaskId`.
frontend/src/components/TestDatePicker.t: A visually distinct test-only date picker dropdown that lets developers select a simulated date from the last 31 days, clearly labeled 'TEST' to avoid confusion with production UI.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A simple icon button that toggles between light and dark themes using `next-themes`, displaying a Sun or Moon icon based on the current theme.
frontend/src/components/TodayEarnsDialog: A dialog that calculates and displays the user's daily income breakdown from tasks and morning/evening routines, and allows submitting payroll with the computed total.
frontend/src/components/UnauthenticatedS: The login/landing screen shown to unauthenticated users, featuring app feature highlights, a login button, registered user count, and an admin bootstrap URL display when an admin token is present in the URL.
frontend/src/components/UniversalAddTask: A dialog for creating tasks with two tabs: one for placing tasks into Eisenhower Matrix quadrants based on urgency/importance toggles, and one for adding tasks to custom lists.
frontend/src/components/UserInfoDialog.t: A dialog for viewing and editing the user's account profile, specifically allowing the user to update their email address with validation.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: A form component for new users to enter their name and email to create a profile, with validation and submission via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanModeTip.ts: Hook that manages whether to show a 'plan mode tip' dialog to a user, using per-user localStorage keys with migration from a legacy global key.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Central collection of React Query hooks (queries and mutations) for all backend data operations including user profiles, tasks, lists, routines, monetary settings, payroll, spend records, and admin functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useTestDate.ts: Test-only hook that provides a date override mechanism stored in sessionStorage, used to simulate different dates for testing routine rollover and streak logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that defines Tailwind base/component/utility layers, OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, and custom utility classes including drag-over styles, text-selection control, safe-area insets, and streak animation effects.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines LocalTask and LocalList types that extend backend types with a localId string for React keys, plus helper functions to convert between backend and local representations.
frontend/src/lib/userTier.ts: Utility functions for working with UserTier enum values, providing label strings, a full list of tiers, and the ordered tier array.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only page with tabs for user directory, tier settings, and storage monitoring; shows an unauthorized state with setup instructions if the caller is not an admin.
frontend/src/pages/TaskManager.tsx: Main application page that orchestrates task, list, routine, earnings, and spend management, handling authentication state and rendering the appropriate UI components and dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/dailyPrioritiesEarnin: Calculates Daily Priorities income by applying quadrant-based scaling divisors to completed task weights, then multiplying by a unit derived from total planned weight across all quadrants.
frontend/src/utils/dragPayload.ts: Provides utilities to write and read drag-and-drop task payloads to/from DataTransfer using a custom MIME type with a text/plain fallback for compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/tierErrors.ts: Parses backend tier-limit error messages for tasks, routines, and custom lists into user-friendly strings with upgrade prompts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to extract URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, accordion keyframes, and enabling the typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state for the Momentum habit tracker app, noting a known issue where the Skipped Day Reset button fails to uncheck boxes or reset the streak, with pending backend and frontend fix requests.
